titles.title: Enhanced 529 - S.A.V.E. Act
Enhanced 529 - Setting Aside for a Valuable Education Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow certain individuals a credit against income tax for contributions to 529 plans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 9/18/2014--Introduced. Enhanced 529 - Setting Aside for a Valuable Education Act or the Enhanced 529 - S.A.V.E. Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) allow a tax credit for contributions to a qualified tuition program (529 tuition program); and (2) allow an exclusion, up to $600, from the gross income of an employee for employer contributions to a 529 tuition program.
